name: Hourglass
description:
This script provides a simple hourglass (i.e. countdown timer) that you can set for any duration.

To use:
1. Add a token to the tabletop and make sure it's named "hourglass" in the nameplate field.
2. Use an !hg command to start, pause, or stop the timer.

!hg start [seconds] or !hg start [minutes]:[seconds] or !hg start [hours]:[minutes]:[seconds]
!hg pause
!hg stop
